title: Display seeded backend prompts in Prompt Library

requirements.summary: Prompt Library fetches prompts from the backend and renders them in the existing grid with correct category labels via categoryConfig.
acceptanceCriteria: After deploy with seeding in place, the Prompt Library page shows 5 prompt cards (when no filters are applied).
Each seeded prompt card renders its title and description and shows the correct category badge label for its category.
No frontend-only mock prompt list is introduced; the page continues to source prompts from useGetAllPrompts / actor.getAllPrompts.

file_operations.description: Harden useGetAllPrompts to always source data from actor.getAllPrompts (no mock fallback), and gracefully handle backend errors (e.g., try/catch returning an empty list while surfacing console error) so the Prompt Library can reliably display the seeded prompts for anonymous users.

Ensure Prompt Library continues to use useGetAllPrompts as the single source of truth and validate/normalize any incoming category search param to a known PromptCategory (else default to 'all') so seeded prompt categories map correctly through the existing PromptCard + categoryConfig labeling.
